summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 NISSAN ROGUE. WHILE IN THE PROCESS OF MAKING A RIGHT TURN, ANOTHER VEHICLE CRASHED INTO THE FRONT OF THE CONTACT'S VEHICLE. THE AIR BAGS FAILED TO DEPLOY. THE DRIVER SUSTAINED HEAD, NECK, AND BACK PAINS DUE TO THE AIR BAG FAILURE. MEDICAL ATTENTION WAS REQUIRED AND A POLICE REPORT WAS FILED. THE INSURANCE COMPANY TOWED THE VEHICLE TO A REPAIR SHOP. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE AND THE CONTACT WAS WAITING FOR THE MANUFACTURER TO PROVIDE A DIAGNOSIS TO DETERMINE THE CAUSE OF THE FAILURE. THE CONTACT LATER RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V244000 (AIR BAGS). THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS NOT AVAILABLE.
